price: E eles usaram de estratagemas contra Jesus; e Allah usou de estratagemas. E Allah é O Melhor em estratagemas.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
